short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any link for later with bettermark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
bettermark is a powerful bookmarking app built for rich web content. Save articles, links, videos, tweets, or just about anything else for later.

With bettermark, you can see rich previews of what you’ve saved. With our deep-text search, you can find something you saved months ago, in seconds. And when you’re done, you can archive the links you no longer need.

The bettermark Chrome extension lets you save links to bettermark with a single click.
